author: Malkeet Singh
title: Lecture GENREC
question:
Hello,
I tried running the solution file (lectures/m09-genrec-qsort), and it returned 
"lambda: found a lambda that is not a function definition"
Could someone help explaining this? 
Thanks,
student_answer: you have to change your language to Intermediate Student with Lambda in the options there should be an option
instructor_answer:
You have to turn on the intermediate student with lambda language to use lambda.
We deliberately don't turn it on in the starter so that students can see that this changes is required to use lambda.
